bottleyourxp-fabric.duskconfig.title: Bottle Your Xp Config
bottleyourxp-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_dama: If enabled, damages the user whenever they create an experience bottle.
bottleyourxp-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_half: The amount of damage the user takes times half a heart when creating an experience bottle.
bottleyourxp-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_rawX: The amount of raw xp it takes to produce an experience bottle. Be careful when setting this too low, as it may enable xp duplication.
